pageTitle: FNB BANCORP (FNBG:OTC US): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13433=FNB Bancorp, Annual General Meeting, Jun 17, 2015., at 18:30 Pacific Standard Time. Location: the Basque Center, 599 Railroad Avenue. Agenda: To elect the nine incumbent directors; to amend the FNB Bancorp 2008 Stock Option Plan; to ratify the appointment of Moss Adams LLP as independent auditors of the Company to serve for the 2015 fiscal year; and t transact such other business as may properly come before the Annual Meeting and any adjournment or adjournments thereof., 14292=FNB Bancorp reported unaudited consolidated earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported interest income of USD 9.068 million compared to USD 8.983 million a year ago. Net interest income was USD 8.554 million compared to USD 8.514 million a year ago. Interest before income taxes was USD 2.614 million compared to USD 2.637 million a year ago. Net earnings were USD 1.799 million compared to USD 1.834 million a year ago. Net earnings available to common shareholders were USD 1.799 million compared to USD 1.664 million a year ago. Diluted earnings per share were USD 0.41 compared to USD 0.38 a year ago. Return on average assets was 0.78% compared to 0.75% a year ago. Return on average equity was 7.33% compared to 7.48% a year ago., 4806=FNB Bancorp operates as the bank holding company for First National Bank of Northern California that provides commercial banking services for individuals and small to mid-sized businesses. The company provides personal and business checking and savings accounts, including individual interest-bearing negotiable orders of withdrawal, money market accounts and/or accounts combining checking and savings accounts with automatic transfer capabilities, IRA accounts, time certificates of deposit, direct deposit services, and computer cash management with access through the Internet. It also offers commercial, construction, accounts receivable, inventory, automobile, home improvement, residential real estate, commercial real estate, small business administration, office equipment, leasehold improvement, and consumer loans, as well as overdraft protection lines of credit, home equity lines, and standby letters of credit. In addition, the company provides business financial products with specialized services, such as courier, appointment banking, and business Internet banking. Further, it sells travelers checks and cashier’s checks; offers automated teller machine services; and provides other customary commercial banking services. The company operates through 12 banking offices in the cities of Daly City, South San Francisco, Millbrae, Pacifica, Half Moon Bay, San Mateo, Redwood City, Pescadero, San Francisco, and Sunnyvale; and a loan production office in Santa Clara County. FNB Bancorp was founded in 1963 and is based in South San Francisco, California., 12808=FNB Bancorp, announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 13 cents per share on the Company's Common Stock totaling approximately $559,353.73 for third quarter of 2015. The dividend is payable on August 14, 2015 to shareholders of record as of July 31, 2015.}
